Housing Zoning Petition (Ordinance #2021-2)

Documents received
A Zoning Petition Has been received from Carolyn Fuller - Ordinance #2021-2 Cambridge Missing
Middle Housing Zoning Petition.
A communication was received from Iram Farooq, Assistant City Manager / Community
Development, regarding the Missing Middle Zoning petition.
A communication was received from Allan Sadun, regarding a presentation for Ordinance
Committee Hearing on April 8, 2021.
Sundry communications received in regard to the Missing Middle Zoning Petition.
